pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Added a simple link/joint list to the palette

content.raw: bit of a hackish thing to do: I deleted a joint's name in the joint inspector so that it's name was effectively "". In the palette joint list, the joint appears to disappear. The blank space for the joint name is still clickable though, and when you exit the model editor it renames the unnamed joint to `__default__`. However, if there are multiple joints set to unnamed, they all receive a name of `__default__`...
content.html: bit of a hackish thing to do: I deleted a joint's name in the joint inspector so that it's name was effectively "". In the palette joint list, the joint appears to disappear. The blank space for the joint name is still clickable though, and when you exit the model editor it renames the unnamed joint to __default__. However, if there are multiple joints set to unnamed, they all receive a name of __default__...
